name: InteractiveTobaccoUseCessationCounseling
title: Interactive Tobacco Use Cessation Counseling
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes or concepts that represent counseling or education commonly done to assist a patient in quitting using tobacco.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Intervention, Performed. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who received tobacco cessation counseling or who refused it.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes identifying live one-on-one interactions between caregiver and patient regarding tobacco cessation.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to providing only written information about quitting. Interactions other than live one-on-one interactions (e.g. letter).)
